attributes.action: All Scottish People in UK should be able to vote in Second Referendum
attributes.additional_details: Discrimination by SNP if they don't allow Scottish people, born and bred, to vote in a referendum for their country, we are British but are proud of being Scottish and should be allowed, before non Scots this vote, if SNP won, would make us foreigners in the UK
attributes.background: Scottish referendum two years ago did not allow Scots in whole of UK to vote
